extraction_summary.critical_finding: NO TASK MANAGEMENT TOOLS DOCUMENTED IN OFFICIAL SOURCES

sources.summary: Covers Claude Code installation, core capabilities (build features, debug, navigate codebases, automate tasks), and architecture philosophy. No mention of task management tools like TaskCreate, TaskUpdate, or TaskList.

architecture: Agentic (can edit files, run commands, create commits)

sources.summary: Explains the agentic loop, core models, and built-in tools organized into four categories: file operations, search, execution, and web. Task management tools are not listed or described.

built_in_tool_categories: File operations - read, edit, create, rename files
Search - find files by pattern, search content with regex
Execution - run shell commands, tests, git operations
Web - search the web, fetch documentation
extensibility_features: Subagents - delegated work with isolated context

sources.summary: Focuses on best practices including CLAUDE.md customization, tool permissions, bash integration, MCP servers, workflows (explore-plan-code-commit, TDD), optimization strategies, and parallel workflows. No task management tools mentioned.

best_practices_topics: Integrating with bash tools and MCP servers

additional_sources_checked.content: Covers extension features: CLAUDE.md, Skills, Subagents, MCP, Hooks, and Plugins
Covers Skills system for extending Claude with custom capabilities through slash commands
Covers CLI commands and 40+ flags, but no TaskCreate/TaskUpdate/TaskList tools mentioned
Technical specification for plugin system (Skills, Agents, Hooks, MCP, LSP)
Covers workflows like session management, plan mode, bug fixes, but no TaskCreate/TaskUpdate/TaskList

critical_findings.finding: Task management tools (TaskCreate, TaskUpdate, TaskList, TaskOutput) are NOT documented in any official Anthropic Claude Code documentation
evidence: All three originally requested sources returned no task-related content
Additional exploratory searches across features, skills, CLI, plugins, and workflows found no task tools
Built-in tools are documented as: File operations, Search, Execution, Web - no Task category
implications: These tools may be internal/undocumented features
They may be part of the system prompt but not user-facing
They could be deprecated or removed from newer versions
Documentation may be incomplete or outdated

critical_findings.finding: Claude Code's documented extensibility does NOT include task management
evidence: Extension mechanisms (Skills, MCP, Hooks, Plugins) are well-documented
No examples or references to task management in any extension documentation
Plugin reference lists available hook events - no task-related events found

recommendations: Investigate internal Claude Code source code or system prompts for task tool definitions
Check if TaskCreate/TaskUpdate/TaskList are available via MCP servers or external plugins
Consider that task management may be handled through different mechanisms (e.g., session management, hooks)
Verify if the requested tools exist in the actual Claude Code CLI vs. documentation
Check Claude Code changelog for any deprecation notices about task features

search_strategy: Exploratory search across related documentation sections
Systematic coverage of features, CLI, plugins, workflows
